Game: Backyard Hockey 2007-09-07T00:00:00-07:00 Backyard Hockey is a sports game released on October 2, 2007. This is the fourth iteration of the Backyard Hockey game from the Backyard Sports series. Backyard Hockey allows you to play ice hockey as professional NHL players as kids.The cover athlete for the game is Nicklas Lidstr√∂m of the Detroit Red Wings.
